entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
